source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.6 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 714,078.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 927,918 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.
